main.name: Amrutha A.J
main.description: I am a {{AGE}} years old with {{EXPERIENCE}} years of experience in JavaScript programming.
main.bio: I am Amrutha A.J from Thrissur, India. I am a {{AGE}} years old with {{EXPERIENCE}} years of experience in JavaScript programming, both front-end(AngularJS) and backend(nodeJS, PostgreSQL). I am a hobbyist artist, so I have a special place in my heart for front-end development. I rescue and foster cats, and I'm confident in handling some of the difficult kitties out there. I enjoy cooking, thriller movies, and rock music!
main.contactmessage: If you have something interesting to discuss, I'd love to hear. Please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: The following are my current skills and my expertise

education.degree: Bachelor's in Technology (Computer Science and Engineering)
education.description: I have learned concepts of data structures and algorithms in detail here. I also taught myself some modern technologies including HTML and JavaScript and started creating some websites myself during my study period for course projects as well as personal projects

work.title: Senior JavaScript Developer
work.description: I initially worked as a front-end developer in AngularJS here. I am presently working on the backend side in nodeJS with PostgreSQL.

work.title: Front-end Developer
work.description: Learned about various front-end development technologies, Learned to convert wire-frames to web pages

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
